caption.p: Temperature–growth relationships as calculated with LMMs (Equations (1) and (2)). Numbers and tile colors represent the fixed effect sizes of the best‐fitting temperature–growth models (lowest BIC) of Larix decidua, Picea abies, Pinus cembra, and Pinus mugo at all study sites. Significance levels of the fixed effects are indicated by * for p < .05, ** for p < .01, and *** for p < .001; for the absolute p values, see Fig. S5. The smaller numbers in brackets are the standard deviations of the random effects
